thread.title: Suspicious man detained, terminal partially evacuated at Kansas City, Mo., airport - @kmbc
thread.title_full: Suspicious man detained, terminal partially evacuated at Kansas City, Mo., airport - @kmbc

author: Jimmy Lovaas
title: Suspicious man detained, terminal partially evacuated at Kansas City, Mo., airport - @kmbc
text:
Terminal C at KCI back to normal following suspicious incident Flight crew says man acting suspiciously UPDATED 6:25 PM CDT Sep 08, 2015 
Terminal C at Kansas City International Airport is open again after it was partially evacuated on Tuesday afternoon. Related OP police ID woman who died after... 
The FBI said the flight crew for American Airlines flight no. 1278 -- from Chicago to Kansas City -- alerted airport authorities about a man acting suspiciously. 
Once the plane landed, airport police met the flight and held the man while his luggage was searched after some suspicious items were found. 
An FBI spokeswoman said it was later determined that they were not a threat to the passengers on the plane or on the ground, and the man was let go. 
Part of Terminal C was evacuated as a precaution. Normal operations returned by 4:30 p.m. CT. Tags Kansas City International Airport terminal partially evacuated man detained 
TONIGHT ON KMBC 9 NEWS AT 6:00. MORE BREAKING NEWS -- PARTS OF KCI ARE EVACUATED TONIGHT AFTER BUT IS BACK OPEN TONIGHT AFTER A AFTER A SUSPICIOUS PASSENGER ON A PLANE. KELLY: NEWSCHOPPER 9'S JOHNNY ROWLANDS IS LIVE AT THE AIRPORT WITH THE LATEST. JOHNNY? JOHNNY: THEY ARE LETTING US HOVER TO SHOW YOU SEE TERMINAL C. AN AMERICAN AIRLINES JET SAW A SUSPICIOUS ACTING PASSENGER, AND RADIOED AHEAD. THE PASSENGER WAS MET BY AIRPORT POLICE AS THE PLANE ARRIVED AND WAS TAKEN INTO CUSTODY AND QUESTIONED. THEY SAID THEY USED AN ABUNDANCE OF CAUTION UNTIL THEY DETERMINE WHAT WAS GOING ON. THEY WENT THROUGH THE LUGGAGE AND FOUND SOME SUSPICIOUS ITEMS, BUT THEN DETERMINED THEY WERE NOT A THREAT TO ANYONE IN THE TERMINAL. WE REALLY DON'T KNOW WHAT KIND OF SUSPICIOUS BEHAVIOR WAS GOING ON, BUT IT MUST NOT HAVE BEEN TOO BAD BECAUSE THEY ALLOWED HIM
